IdentityDocument.name: IdentityDocument
IdentityDocument.description: Represents information about documents used to identify Financial Services Cloud clients.

IdDocumentType.description: Type of the document that’s used to verify the client’s identity.

IssueDate.description: Date when the document was issued.

IssuingAuthority.description: The authority that issued the document.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who created this record.

PartyProfileId.description: The party profile associated with this record.

RelatedLegalEntityId.description: ID of the legal entity related to this document.

VerifiedById.description: Name of the person who verified this document.

VerifiedOn.description: Date when this document was verified.
